word:
297
The prayer for daily bread includes not only food to sustain the body, but that spiritual bread which will nourish the soul unto life everlasting. Jesus bids us, \93Labor not for the meat which perisheth, but for that meat which endureth unto everlasting life.\94 John 6:27. He says, \93I am the living bread which came down from heaven: if any man eat of this bread, he shall live forever.\94 Verse 51.
